scripts.minify: rm -rf ./assets/style/ && css-minify -d /static/style/ -o /assets/style/ && css-minify -d /static/style/page/ -o /assets/style/ && cat ./assets/style/* > ./assets/style/style.min.css && cd ./assets/style/ && find . ! -name 'style.min.css' -type f -exec rm -f {} +
scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run compile && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.dev: npm run minify && npm run compile && JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll serve --watch
